attributes.action: We are calling on the government to adopt a definition of Islamaphobia.
attributes.additional_details:
A leaked dossier in May 2019 set out more than 100 accusations of Islamophobia and other incidents of racism against people claiming to be Conservative party members.

Read the All Party Parliamentary Group on British Muslims report written out of their inquiry into a working definition of Islamophobia:

https://static1.squarespace.com/static/599c3d2febbd1a90cffdd8a9/t/5bfd1ea3352f531a6170ceee/1543315109493/Islamophobia+Defined.pdf
attributes.background: We are calling on the government and the Conservative Party to adopt a definition of Islamaphobia / anti-Muslim hatred. We suggest the following definition: “Islamophobia is rooted in racism and is a type of racism that targets expressions of Muslimness or perceived Muslimness.”

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for the decisions of individual political parties.
